item.description:
So... we've pretty much wrapped up the theatre season, and will start up again in the fall. Over the summer, though, there are still a few theatres that remain active. So look for some Meetups scheduled by Ron at 2nd Story or maybe Theatre-by-the-Sea.

To wrap up the main season, we're having an End-of-Season dinner at Joe's American Bar & Grill at Providence Place. Good, casual food and easy parking at the mall. We'll meet at 8 pm. Just ask at the hostess stand for the RI Theatre Group. Please do RSVP so I can get a head count and make a reservation.

It's short notice, I know, but hope you can make it. Everyone is welcome, even if you've never come out before.

Also, thanks to those of you who have paid the $7 annual membership fee to help cover the time and money I put into this group. If you haven't paid yet, please do so through our website. Click on Contribution on the left side of the page. It's much appreciated!

If we don't see you Friday, hope you can make a play over the summer or see you in the fall!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at hostess stand for RI Theatre Group
item.name: End of Season Meetup - Dinner/Drinks
